name: Overgrown
desc: Thick grass, vines, or other growths cover this arena, making movement far more difficult.
effect: This _Arena_ is _Rough_. All Size 1 or less creatures have _Soft Cover_. A creature may Attack the Arena; if they deal at least 3 _Slash_ Damage they may create a piece of _Terrain_ that does not have Overgrown. Any effects that Targets the whole Arena and does at least 8 _Slash_ Damage removes Overgrown.

name: Cliff
desc: This arena is a sheer cliff, difficult to climb with few handholds.
effect: It costs two additional _Movement_ to enter or leave this _Arena_and a creature must have two _Free Hands_ (or equivalent) to climb. Any creature in this _Arena_ has _Disadvantage_ on all rolls, and rolls against them have _Advantage_ as they attempt to cling to the cliff. Creatures with the _Climber_ trait or similar ignore all these penalties.

name: Gusting
desc: A powerful gust that lasts only a short while.
effect: When this Terrain is applied, remove any [_Cloud_] _Terrain_. Non-Melee Attacks against a creature in this _Arena_ or that pass through or originate from this _Arena_ automatically decrease their Rank by 1.

name: Veiled
desc: Terrain filled with dust, smoke, mist, or some other obscuring agent.
effect: All creatures in this _Arena_ benefit from _Soft Cover_.

name: Stalagmite
desc: A large rock, log, or some other.

name: Stalactite
desc: A large rock, log, or some other.
effect: Only [_Flying_] creatures may _Occupy_ this; if they do, they do not lose _Flying_.
destroy: When destroyed, this falls to the ground. Creatures in the _Arena_ must _Negate_ [_Reflex_ 8]; on a failure they are _Hit_, on a success they are instead _Grazed_. This is a [_Stab_, _Earth_] effect. Create four _Moderate Sources_ [_Earth_].

name: Tripping Hazard
desc: A low protrusion that, most of the time, is easily avoided, but could trip one forced into it.
effect: If a creature is made to _Occupy_ this _Terrain_ with _Forced Movement_ they fall _Prone_.
